thread.title: Demers Ambulances has named Emergency Equipment Professionals (EEP) Inc. as their dealer for the states of MS, AL and TN
thread.title_full: Demers Ambulances has named Emergency Equipment Professionals (EEP) Inc. as their dealer for the states of MS, AL and TN - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Demers Ambulances has named Emergency Equipment Professionals (EEP) Inc. as their dealer for the states of MS, AL and TN
text:
Demers-Ambulances inc.
BELOEIL, QC , Sept. 2, Demers Ambulances is proud to announce it has signed Emergency Equipment Professionals (EEP) Inc. as their new dealer for the states of Mississippi , Alabama and Tennessee .
"This will enable Demers to effectively meet the needs of our customers," said Benoit Lafortune , Executive Vice-President for Demers Ambulances. "Emergency Equipment Professionals has three service centers located in Mississippi and Alabama , giving them a strategic advantage. Local service is a key component of a successful dealership and the folks at EEP understand that. Combine that with their experienced sales force and their aggressive growth strategy, we are eager to see what the future holds for our two organizations."
"This is a definite step forward for our company", noted Jeff Kuntz , Owner & President at EEP Inc. ''We believe that the Demers product offering is hands-down the best value available in the ambulance industry today. We are extremely excited to start showcasing this new product to our customer base and we are confident they will recognize the added-value as well."
Owner, Jeff Kuntz , has over 30 years of experience in Fire & EMS Industry, and in the early 2000's helped to launch a company which later resulted in the creation of EEP. The new business, EEP, is family-owned and operated by husband and wife team, Jeff and Mary Kuntz . Together with their team, they are focused on serving customer needs in Alabama , Mississippi and Tennessee , offering an exceptional level of customer service.
Demers Ambulances is a North American leader in the design, manufacture and distribution of ambulances, and one of the largest firms of its kind in North America . Over the past 55 years, Demers Ambulances has sold more than 18,000 ambulances to customers in over 20 countries. Demers Ambulances is accredited ISO 9001:2008 and certified by Transport Canada and the USA DOT, by the National Truck Equipment Association (NTEA) in the USA within their "MEMBER VERIFICATION PROGRAM" and recognized as a "QUALIFIED VEHICLES MODIFIER" (QVM) by the Ford Motor Company and, approved up fitter for Mercedes Benz Sprinter Customer Assurance Program. Demers Ambulances meets the highest standards in the industry. To learn more about Demers Ambulances, visit www.demers-ambulances.com
